name: Kurai: Story of a Shinigami
description:
A new-born god of Death faces his first challenge and discovers what it means to have a soul be judge by his own volition. Discover as Kurai seeks knowledge and wisdom by searching for an ancient god of Death, from another culture, and convinces him to guide him in his future endeavours.

   

CREDITS

  • Beatriz Miranda
  • Duarte Rodrigues
  • Gabriela Ferreira
  • Miguel Ferreira

Sounds: freesound.org

2D Assets:

  • Post Apo Lands - Szadi Art
  • Rogue Fantasy 'Catacombs' - Szadi Art
  • Universal LPC Spritesheet Generator - Stephen Challener (Redshrike), Johannes Sjölund (wulax)
